name: Aleph (sirdorius)
description:
A narrative focused adventure game about vampires and questioning one's traditions. I know that it will be polarizing, but I just felt this had to be out there.

This is my first time doing a narrative focused game for a jam. It was an interesting challenge working on the world building and dialogue. I ended up writing 250 lines of dialogue and implementing a pretty simple but flexible system for dialogues.

Made for Mini Jam 118

🎮 Controls

Pretty straightforward:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • E/Space to interact

🙏 Credits

Music: Paradisial Dream by Lorens4444
